mapper.select: select count(*) from llm_notification where deleted = false

select n.*, COUNT(CASE WHEN m.status = 'stay_claim' THEN 1 END) AS stayClaimCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN m.status = 'claimed' THEN 1 END) AS claimCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN m.status = 'settlement' THEN 1 END) AS settlementCount, COUNT(m.id) AS total from llm_notification n left join llm_single_mission m on m.notification_Uid = n.uid where n.deleted = false and (m.deleted = false or m.deleted is null) group by n.uid order by create_time desc limit #{start},#{end}
